mapper.select: select * from versions as v where name = #{name} and v.using = 1 and type = 'websites';
select id from versions where name = #{name} and type = 'websites';
select distinct type as name,name as value from versions where type = #{type} and type2 = #{type2} and nmp = 1
select * from versions where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and versions.nmp = 1;
select * from versions where id = (select versionId from websites where id = #{id} and nmp = 1) and nmp =1;
mapper.insert: insert into versions set createTime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() , name = #{name}, defPage = #{defPage} , defJs = #{defJs}, defCss = #{defCss},type = #{type}, type2 = #{type2}, sign = #{sign}
mapper.update: update versions set versions.nmp = 0 where id = #{id} and name = #{name} and versions.using != 1;
